Class CompoundShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • SelectableShape
      • CompoundShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, SceneShape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CarShape, HouseShape, SnowmanShape

    public abstract class CompoundShape
extends SelectableShape
    This class extends SelectableShape so that it can use the GeneralPath class. The generalpath class makes it easier to detect whether a point is within the shape
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nicholas Liu (nl2523)
